content: His strongest attack by far is when he jumps into the air with his green weapon, charging it with energy before crashing down with it. It will cause a huge electrical explosion when he lands, but then spread outward with several lighting strikes that cover a wide area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Chen Loong'.
The content is as follows:
His strongest attack by far is when he jumps into the air with his green weapon, charging it with energy before crashing down with it. It will cause a huge electrical explosion when he lands, but then spread outward with several lighting strikes that cover a wide area.
